DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , double blind , placebo-controlled clinical trial . It aim demonstrate ( 1 ) Chinese medicine prescription `` Wu Zhu Yu Tang '' prevent Acute Mountain Sickness ( AMS ) ( 2 ) `` Wu Zhu Yu Tang '' prevent AMS especially Yang-Xu body constitution . We randomize 240 unacclimatized healthy adult . They randomize stratification Yang-Xu score AMS history receive Chinese medicine one ascent placebo ascent . We take Hehuan mountain two day hike ( 24 hour ) overnight 3,000m . One month study , subject fill `` Body Constitution Questionnaire BCQ '' order evaluate body constitution . Before , two day hike measure blood pressure , heart rate arterial oxygen saturation .
